tool.name: RenameGrabs
tool.displayname: Rename grab + profiles for given date
tool.summary:
Manually rename vertical profile and water quality grab samples so that the site codes match.

WQP - vertical profiles

GRAB - grab samples

Select date to pull all WQP and GRAB sites for a given date. Then modify the "New" column to change or modify site codes (you can add new site using the Create New Sites \ New Profile Site tool). Each WQP should match with a GRAB site name.

idCitation.resTitle: Rename grab + profiles for given date

dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Manually rename vertical profile and water quality grab samples so that the site codes match.

WQP - vertical profiles

GRAB - grab samples

Select date to pull all WQP and GRAB sites for a given date. Then modify the "New" column to change or modify site codes (you can add new site using the Create New Sites \ New Profile Site tool). Each WQP should match with a GRAB site name.
